titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Jack Valenti should be recognized for his contributions to public service and public entertainment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 5/1/2007--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Jack Valenti should be recognized for his contributions to public service (as an advisor to U.S. President Lyndon Johnson) and public entertainment (as President of the Motion Picture Association of America).
